channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Five Steps To Supercharge Your Offensive Security Program
item.description: It's time to supercharge offensive security programs to proactively mitigate vulnerabilities before they are exploited.

item.title: The Western Union trap
item.description: When the telephone began to gain traction, the monopoly of the time, Western Union, decided to get even better at sending telegrams.

item.title: 10^80: The Potential Reach Of LLMs
item.description: As businesses pour billions of dollars into LLM research and development, there is an interesting question: What is AI's potential?

item.title: The near future (and summer reads)
item.description: Near-future science fiction is a fine way to consider our now. Without the reality of today, we can think hard about the tomorrow we’re about to live ...

item.title: Why PayPal’s Comeback Plan Could Take Years, If It Works At All
item.description: With its stock down 80% from its pandemic high and its share of online payments slipping, the fintech pioneer and new CEO Alex Chriss need a win.

item.title: Phrenology
item.description: For thousands of years, and as recently as the 1930s, phrenology was seen as a useful proxy to judge someone’s character. Carefully charting the bumps...

item.title: Climate Change-Induced Extreme Weather Events Linked To Poor Cardiovascular Health
item.description: Climate change impacts like extreme temperatures, hurricanes, and dust storms are linked to a higher prevalence of cardiovascular disease and even inc...

item.title: Are you weather?
item.description: The thunderstorm doesn’t know we exist. Rain dances and wishes are ineffective at bringing or preventing a storm, because it isn’t caused by our actio...

item.title: ‘Still Wakes The Deep’ Review: A Game Acting Masterpiece
item.description: ‘Still Wakes the Deep’ mostly meets expectations, but it pushes the boundaries and sets a new bar for acting in modern gaming.

item.title: “What will I tell my boss?”
item.description: If you can’t answer that six-word question, you’re selling a commodity. Organizations don’t buy things, people do. And people at companies aren’t spen...
